title: Strengthening Medical Practice Competencies: Training Integrating Action Observation and Motor Imagery (AOMI)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve ≥80% improvement in accuracy when performing motor skills after a 5-day training program
Learners demonstrate ≥30% increase in self-confidence compared to baseline assessments via self-efficacy questionnaires
Learners achieve over 75% similarity between actual motor performance and imagery performance by applying AOMI training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
